sentences.sentence: As a rule he writes English very well, but occasionally unidiomatic expressions creep in.
sentences.translation: 他通常英语写得很好，可是偶尔会夹杂一些不合习惯的表达方式。

sentences.sentence: The errors I am talking about include unidiomatic English, grammatical blunders, misspellings and improper word division at the end of the lines.
sentences.translation: 我在此处所谈及的英文错误包括不通顺、语法错误、拼写错误以及行尾不正确的断字回行。

sentences.sentence: Under the negative influence of Chinese, the translator will produce unidiomatic version when translating the Chinese article abstract into English.
sentences.translation: 汉语摘要英译过程中，译者有时会受汉语“负迁移”的作用，产出一些不合英语表达习惯的“不地道”译文。
